Johanna.name: Punish
Johanna.description: Step forward dealing 113 (+4% per level) damage and slowing enemies by 60% decaying over 2 seconds.

Johanna.name: Condemn
Johanna.description: After 1 second, you pull nearby enemies toward you, stunning them for 0.25 seconds and dealing 55 (+4% per level) damage. Deals 200% increased damage to Minions and Mercenaries.

Johanna.name: Shield Glare
Johanna.description: Deal 59 (+4% per level) damage to enemies and cause them to miss Basic Attacks for 1.5 seconds.

Johanna.name: Falling Sword
Johanna.description: Johanna leaps towards an area.  While in the air, she can steer the landing location by moving.  After 2 seconds Johanna lands, dealing 365 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and knocking them into the air.

Johanna.name: Blessed Shield
Johanna.description: Deal 114 (+4% per level) damage and stun the first enemy hit for 1.5 seconds. Blessed Shield then bounces to 2 nearby enemies, dealing 57 (+4% per level) damage and stunning them for 0.75 seconds.

Johanna.name: Iron Skin
Johanna.description: Gain a Shield that absorbs 674 (+4% per level) damage for 4 seconds. While this Shield is active, you are Unstoppable.

1.name: Regeneration Master
1.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases your Health Regeneration by 1 per second, up to 30.   Reward: After gathering 30 Regeneration Globes, you also gain 500 Health.

1.name: Reinforce
1.description: Using a Basic Ability grants 50 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing damage taken by 50%. Stores up to 2 charges.

1.name: Righteous Smash
1.description: Punish restores 10 Mana per enemy hit.

4.name: Eternal Retaliation
4.description: Condemn's cooldown is lowered by 0.75 seconds for each enemy affected. Maximum of 10 targets.

4.name: Laws of Hope
4.description: Activate to heal 20% of Johanna's max Health over 4 seconds. Passive: Regenerate 10 Health per second.

7.name: Blessed Momentum
7.description: Basic Attacks reduce Johanna's Basic Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.

7.name: Conviction
7.description: Movement Speed is increased by 25% while Condemn is charging up.

7.name: Sins Exposed
7.description: Shield Glare marks enemies for 4 seconds. The next time any ally damages them, they take 68 (+4% per level) extra damage and the mark is removed.

7.name: The Crusade Marches On
7.description: Basic and Heroic Abilities lower the cooldown of Iron Skin by 1.5 seconds.

10.name: Blessed Shield
10.description: Deal 114 (+4% per level) damage and stun the first enemy hit for 1.5 seconds. Blessed Shield then bounces to 2 nearby enemies, dealing 57 (+4% per level) damage and stunning them for 0.75 seconds.

10.name: Falling Sword
10.description: Johanna leaps towards an area.  While in the air, she can steer the landing location by moving.  After 2 seconds Johanna lands, dealing 365 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and knocking them into the air.

13.name: Burning Rage
13.description: Deal 23 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.

13.name: Hold Your Ground
13.description: Increases Iron Skin's Shield by 20%, and if the Shield is destroyed by damage the cooldown is reduced by 4 seconds.

13.name: Subdue
13.description: Increases Punish's slow to 80% decaying over 3 seconds.

16.name: Blessed Hammer
16.description: Condemn also creates a hammer that spirals around Johanna, dealing 41 (+4% per level) damage to enemies it hits.

16.name: Fanaticism
16.description: While Iron Skin is active, Johanna gains 8% Movement Speed each time she takes damage.  Stacks up to 40%.

16.name: Holy Renewal
16.description: Every enemy Hero affected by Shield Glare heals you for 114 (+4% per level).

16.name: Imposing Presence
16.description: Activate to slow the Attack Speed by 50% and Movement Speed by 20% of nearby Heroes and Summons for 2.5 seconds. Passive: Heroes and Summons that attack your Hero have their Attack Speed slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

20.name: Heaven's Fury
20.description: While in the air, holy bolts rain down on enemies dealing 75 (+4% per level) damage and reducing the cooldown of Falling Sword by 2 seconds for each enemy hit.

20.name: Indestructible
20.description: Upon taking fatal damage, Johanna gains a Shield equal to her maximum Health for 5 seconds. This effect has a 120 second cooldown.

20.name: Radiating Faith
20.description: Increases Blessed Shield's stun duration by 33% and maximum enemies hit by 2.

20.name: Storm Shield
20.description: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.
